name: google-photos-mcp
description: Access and search your Google Photos library with Claude
long_description:
This extension allows Claude to search and interact with your Google Photos library. Features include:

- Search photos by content, keywords, dates, and locations
- Get detailed information about specific photos
- List and browse photo albums
- Access location data for photos (when available)
- Export photo information in various formats

Requires Google Photos authentication via OAuth2 flow.
